app.name: PDF Manipulator
app.description: A modern web application for PDF file manipulation

dashboard.title: PDF Tools Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Upload a PDF file to get started with our powerful PDF manipulation tools.
dashboard.noRecentFiles: No recent files to display. Upload some to see them here!

upload.title: Upload your PDF file
upload.subtitle: Drag and drop your PDF file here, or click to browse
upload.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds the maximum limit of {{size}} MB.
upload.fileNotPdf: The uploaded file is not a valid PDF.
upload.selectToolPrompt: Select a tool to proceed with your PDF file.

addWatermark.title: Add Watermark
addWatermark.description: Add text or image watermarks to your PDF files.
addWatermark.noFileLoadedDesc: Please upload a PDF file to add a watermark.
addWatermark.imageSettingsNote: Image watermarking is not yet implemented.
addWatermark.watermarkCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been successfully watermarked.
addWatermark.howTo: How to Add Watermarks to PDF Files

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Choose between text or image watermark.
steps.step4: Click the "Add Watermark" button to process the file.
steps.step5: Once processing is complete, download the watermarked PDF file.

addWatermark.imageWatermarkNotImplemented: Image watermarking is not implemented yet.

merge.title: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.
merge.onlyPdfsOrDuplicates: Only PDF files can be added. Duplicate files are ignored.
merge.atLeastTwoFiles: Please add at least two PDF files to merge.
merge.addMorePrompt: You can add multiple PDF files. Drag to reorder.
merge.mergeCompleteDesc: Your PDF files have been merged into one document.

steps.step1: Add two or more PDF files using the file browser above.
steps.step3: Click the "Merge PDFs" button to start merging.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download your merged PDF.

split.title: Split PDF
split.description: Split a PDF into multiple files by page range, interval, or extract specific pages.
split.splitCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been split. Download the ZIP archive with the resulting files.
split.pageRangeDesc: Enter page ranges to split, e.g., 1-3,5,7-9.
split.intervalDesc: Split the PDF every N pages (e.g., 2 = every 2 pages).
split.invalidInterval: Please enter a valid interval (number greater than 0).
split.extractDesc: Extract all, only even, or only odd pages into separate PDFs.

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Choose a split method and set the options.
steps.step3: Click the "Split PDF" button to start splitting.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download the ZIP archive with split PDFs.

deletePages.title: Delete Pages
deletePages.description: Remove specific pages from your PDF file.
deletePages.fileOrRangeMissing: Please select a PDF file and specify the pages to delete.
deletePages.errorGettingPageCount: Could not determine the number of pages in the PDF.
deletePages.pageRangeDesc: Enter the page numbers or ranges you want to remove. Example: 2,4-6 will remove pages 2, 4, 5, and 6.
deletePages.deleteCompleteDesc: The selected pages have been removed from your PDF.
deletePages.howToTitle: How to Delete Pages from a PDF

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Enter the page numbers or ranges to delete (e.g. 2,4-6 for pages 2, 4, 5, and 6).
steps.step3: Click the "Delete Pages" button to process the file.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download your modified PDF.

extractImages.title: Extract Images
extractImages.description: Extract all or selected images from your PDF file.
extractImages.extractCompleteDesc: Extracted images have been saved to a ZIP archive.
extractImages.pageRangeDesc: Specify which pages to extract images from, e.g., 1-3, 5 or leave blank for all pages.
extractImages.minWidthDesc: Only extract images with at least this width (in pixels).
extractImages.minHeightDesc: Only extract images with at least this height (in pixels).
extractImages.howToTitle: How to Extract Images from PDF

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Set extraction options such as page range, image format, and minimum size.
steps.step3: Click the "Extract Images" button to start extraction.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download the ZIP archive with extracted images.

extractText.title: Extract Text
extractText.description: Extract all or selected text from your PDF file.
extractText.pageRangeDesc: Specify which pages to extract text from, e.g., 1-3, 5 or leave blank for all pages.
extractText.preserveLayoutDesc: Try to keep the original layout and spacing of the text.
extractText.howToTitle: How to Extract Text from PDF

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Set extraction options such as page range and layout preservation.
steps.step3: Click the "Extract Text" button to start extraction.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download or copy the extracted text.

exportPng.title: Export to PNG
exportPng.description: Convert PDF pages to PNG images.
exportPng.exportComplete: PDF exported to PNG images successfully!
exportPng.exportCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been converted to PNG images. Download the ZIP archive.
exportPng.resolutionDesc: Set the DPI (dots per inch) for the exported images. Higher values mean better quality but larger files.
exportPng.pageRangeDesc: Specify which pages to export as images. (UI only, not used by backend.)
exportPng.transparentBackgroundDesc: Make the background transparent (PNG only). (UI only, not used by backend.)
exportPng.howToTitle: How to Export PDF Pages to PNG

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Set the desired resolution and other export options.
steps.step3: Click the "Export to PNG" button to start the conversion.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download the ZIP archive with PNG images.

exportJpg.title: Export to JPG
exportJpg.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG images.
exportJpg.exportComplete: PDF exported to JPG images successfully!
exportJpg.exportCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been converted to JPG images. Download the ZIP archive.
exportJpg.resolutionDesc: Set the DPI (dots per inch) for the exported images. Higher values mean better quality but larger files.
exportJpg.qualityDesc: Adjust the quality of the JPG images. (UI only, not used by backend.)
exportJpg.pageRangeDesc: Specify which pages to export as images. (UI only, not used by backend.)
exportJpg.howToTitle: How to Export PDF Pages to JPG

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Set the desired resolution and other export options.
steps.step3: Click the "Export to JPG" button to start the conversion.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download the ZIP archive with JPG images.

nUp.title: Multiple Pages Per Sheet
nUp.description: Arrange multiple PDF pages on a single sheet (N-up).
nUp.processCompleteDesc: Your PDF has been rearranged with multiple pages per sheet.
nUp.advancedOptionsNote: Advanced options like page range, order, and orientation are UI only and not sent to the backend.

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Select how many pages you want per sheet.
steps.step3: Click the "Create N-up PDF" button to process the file.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download your N-up PDF.

compress.title: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce the file size of your PDF by adjusting compression settings.
compress.imageQualityDesc: Adjust the quality of images in the PDF. Lower values reduce file size but may affect image clarity.
compress.removeDuplicatesDesc: Removes repeated images to reduce file size.

steps.step1: Upload a PDF file using the file browser above.
steps.step2: Choose your desired compression level and options.
steps.step3: Click the "Compress PDF" button to start compression.
steps.step4: Once processing is complete, download your compressed PDF.

auth.title: PDF Manipulator
auth.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.name: Name

history.title: Usage History
history.subtitle: View and manage the application's activity log.
history.activityLogDesc: A detailed log of all significant actions performed within the application.
history.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all history records? This action cannot be undone.
history.exportSuccess: History exported successfully. Check your downloads.
history.author: Author (User)
history.noEntriesFoundForPage: No entries found for this page.

errors.exportFailed: Failed to export CSV. Please try again.
errors.clearFailed: Failed to clear history. Please try again.
errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch history data. Please try again.

api.title: PDF Manipulator API
api.authDetails: Our API uses API keys for authentication. You can generate an API key in your account settings.

errors.notFoundDesc: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
